name: Gretel & Hansel (YifanZheng, Emily Xie, clarelee)
description:
Gretel and Hansel is a pixel art game adaptation of the classic German fairy tale.

Two players, play as the siblings, trapped in the witch’s house, trying to escape, while the third player, the witch, is hunting them down one by one.

Two monitors and three Xbox controllers required to play this game.
